name: Prohibited acts; flammable solvents
text:
(a)  No qualifying patient or primary caregiver shall use butane to extract tetrahydrocannabinol from cannabis plants.
     (b)  Any person who violates this section shall be guilty of a class C felony. [L 2015, c 241, pt of §5]
 
Revision Note
 
  In subsection (a), "marijuana" changed to "cannabis" to conform to L 2017, c 170, pursuant to §23G-15.
